TextView.android:text: Preventiv Maintenance Schedule of IP-AMSS (In House)- DAILY

Line, Mains, Inv Line LED status

Power LED ON and LAN Connection blinking and Mode LED Green

Using cat/proc/drbd record the status of drbd
All network status (in NMS) should be green
Perform system changeoveer and record status
Take backup to FTP server from SUA, SUB and verify it
Check server time with NTP server time
